thread.title: I left stuff ... unfortunate this time
thread.title_full: I left stuff ... unfortunate this time - Review of Element New York Times Square West, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Mommyno1
title: I left stuff ... unfortunate this time
text: My husband book this hotel because of kitchen which we never use and he knew and room is little bigger than many hotels.good. But elevater is Only 3 for over40 floor? No way and yes I have to wait more than 3 min. Kitchen well equipped. They have plate cup, sponge , dish was soap, etc... they have gym good point bigger than some hotels also. ! No one use so I did yoga watching YouTube. Any way good so far. but when next day after I checked out I was unfortunate I forget my phone charger and adapter conecter for I phone. I called them ( already I was my home but my kid live in NYC) some times honest clean people giving to reception but this time not.. it was my mistake. But few times I was in NYC hotel I forget something in a hotel (already checked out) next day I asked and yes they keep stuff... many times I was lucky( I chenged hotels for work and day off) any way I think I never come back here
